channel.title: CVE Feed for CodeAstrology Team -- UltraAddons Elementor Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CodeAstrology Team -- UltraAddons Elementor Lite

item.title: CVE-2024-49277|2024-10-17T19:23:40.347Z -- codeastrology%20team -- ultraaddons%20elementor%20lite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CodeAstrology Team UltraAddons Elementor Lite allows Stored XSS.This issue affects UltraAddons Elementor Lite: from n/a through 1.1.8.
